app.name: Wii Dashboard
app.long_description:
A feature-rich dashboard for Nintendo Wii featuring: - World Clock with multiple timezones - Real-time Stock Market viewer - Notes manager with SD card support - Glassmorphism UI effects - WiFi connectivity for live data
Controls: - Wiimote IR: Point and click - D-Pad: Navigate menus - A: Select/Confirm - B: Back/Cancel - Home: Exit
